scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:js & npm run optimize:css
scripts.config:development: cp src/app/config/development.js dist/ && mv dist/development.js dist/config.js
scripts.config:staging: cp src/app/config/staging.js dist/ && mv dist/staging.js dist/config.js
scripts.config:production: cp src/app/config/production.js dist/ && mv dist/production.js dist/config.js
scripts.copy:development: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:icons
scripts.copy:production: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:icons
scripts.build:development: npm run elm:development && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development && npm run config:development
scripts.build:staging: npm run elm:development && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development && npm run config:staging
scripts.build:production: npm run elm:production && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:production && npm run optimize && npm run config:production
